thread.title_full: A perfect Mother's Day - Review of Covent Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bay-back
title: A perfect Mother's Day
text: It was Mothering Sunday and no reservation but the welcoming restaurant manager, who is always a joy to meet, effortlessly fitted us in for a perfect Sunday lunch of roast lamb and chicken. The mint and bread sauces were to die for and were perfect accompaniments to the well cooked meats, as were the gorgeous roast potatoes. Always our favourite hotel, made so by a beautiful room and wonderful staff. Unfortunately our mothers are no longer with us but they would have loved how we celebrated lunch in their name at this beautiful hotel and restaurant. It was one of their favourites; it is still ours.
